document.bingtitle: The Good 3D, The Bad And The Nauseating
document.description: Imagine a floor the size of a fast food restaurant full of PSPs, PS3s, people carrying trays of hors d'oeuvre ... going to have an impact on me the same way a killer car ...
document.body: You will be redirected to Kotaku's mobile site at http://m.kotaku.com
